results.title: Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension.
results.text_hl: The present study examined if controlling @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ with @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@, or given in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, slows the progression of @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal injury@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Williams JM, Murphy SR, Wu W, Border JJ, Fan F, Roman RJ. Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension. Geroscience. 2022 Dec;44(6):2845-2861. PMID: 35767209
citations.BibTeX: @article{35767209, title={Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension.}, author={Williams JM and Murphy SR and Wu W and Border JJ and Fan F and Roman RJ}, journal={Geroscience}, volume={44}, number={6}, pages={2845-2861}}

results.title: [Efficacy of combined antihypertensive treatment with amlodipine and lisinopril in metabolic syndrome].
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ monotherapy improved @CHEMICAL_Carbohydrates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002241 @@@carbohydrate@@@ metabolism as shown by reduction of postprandial @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and @DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyperinsulinemia@@@ in @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@MS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Shevchenko OP, Praskurnichiĭ EA, Savel'eva SA. [Efficacy of combined antihypertensive treatment with amlodipine and lisinopril in metabolic syndrome]. Ter Arkh. 2008;80(4):54-9. PMID: 18491582
citations.BibTeX: @article{18491582, title={[Efficacy of combined antihypertensive treatment with amlodipine and lisinopril in metabolic syndrome].}, author={Shevchenko OP and Praskurnichiĭ EA and Savel'eva SA}, journal={Ter Arkh}, volume={80}, number={4}, pages={54-9}}

results.title: Renoprotective effects of combined SGLT2 and ACE inhibitor therapy in diabetic Dahl S rats
results.text_hl: These results suggest that long-term control of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ with @CHEMICAL_1_5_anhydro_1_(5_(4_ethoxybenzyl)_2_methoxy_4_methylphenyl)_1_thioglucitol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C549343 @@@luseogliflozin@@@, especially in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ to lower blood pressure, attenuates the development of @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal injury@@@ in this @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of advanced @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Kojima N, Williams JM, Slaughter TN, Kato S, Takahashi T, Miyata N, Roman RJ. Renoprotective effects of combined SGLT2 and ACE inhibitor therapy in diabetic Dahl S rats Physiol Rep. 2015 Jul;3(7):. PMID: 26169541
citations.BibTeX: @article{26169541, title={Renoprotective effects of combined SGLT2 and ACE inhibitor therapy in diabetic Dahl S rats}, author={Kojima N and Williams JM and Slaughter TN and Kato S and Takahashi T and Miyata N and Roman RJ}, journal={Physiol Rep}, volume={3}, number={7}}

results.title: Effects of chronic treatment with lisinopril on cardiovascular complications in streptozotocin diabetic and DOCA hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: Injection of @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@ produced severe @DISEASE_Glycosuria @DISEASE_MESH:D006029 @@@glycosuria@@@ (> 2%), @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, hypoinsulnaemia, polydypsia, @DISEASE_Hyperphagia @DISEASE_MESH:D006963 @@@polyphagia@@@ and @DISEASE_Body_Weight @DISEASE_MESH:D001835 @@@loss of body weight@@@.

citations.NLM: Sevak AR, Goyal RK. Effects of chronic treatment with lisinopril on cardiovascular complications in streptozotocin diabetic and DOCA hypertensive rats. Pharmacol Res. 1996 Nov-Dec;34(5-6):201-9. PMID: 9076844
citations.BibTeX: @article{9076844, title={Effects of chronic treatment with lisinopril on cardiovascular complications in streptozotocin diabetic and DOCA hypertensive rats.}, author={Sevak AR and Goyal RK}, journal={Pharmacol Res}, volume={34}, number={5-6}, pages={201-9}}

results.title: Pancreatic islet beta-cell deficit and glucose intolerance in rats with uninephrectomy.
results.text_hl: Histological staining revealed an islet beta-cell deficit associated with increased immunoreactivity for angiotensin and angiotensin type 1 receptor in UNX @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@. Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ significantly improved @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal dysfunction@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, insulin secretion and islet RAS expression.

citations.NLM: Sui Y, Zhao HL, Ma RC, Ho CS, Kong AP, Lai FM, Ng HK, Rowlands DK, Chan JC, Tong PC. Pancreatic islet beta-cell deficit and glucose intolerance in rats with uninephrectomy. Cell Mol Life Sci. 2007 Dec;64(23):3119-28. PMID: 17955176
citations.BibTeX: @article{17955176, title={Pancreatic islet beta-cell deficit and glucose intolerance in rats with uninephrectomy.}, author={Sui Y and Zhao HL and Ma RC and Ho CS and Kong AP and Lai FM and Ng HK and Rowlands DK and Chan JC and Tong PC}, journal={Cell Mol Life Sci}, volume={64}, number={23}, pages={3119-28}}

results.title: Fenofibrate and dipyridamole treatments in low-doses either alone or in combination blunted the development of nephropathy in diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@Fenofibrate@@@, but not @CHEMICAL_Dipyridamole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004176 @@@dipyridamole@@@, significantly prevented the @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ alteration and importantly the @CHEMICAL_Uric_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014527 @@@uric acid@@@ elevation in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ (5mg/kg, p.o., 4 weeks, reference compound), prevented the @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ alteration and development of @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Balakumar P, Varatharajan R, Nyo YH, Renushia R, Raaginey D, Oh AN, Akhtar SS, Rupeshkumar M, Sundram K, Dhanaraj SA. Fenofibrate and dipyridamole treatments in low-doses either alone or in combination blunted the development of nephropathy in diabetic rats. Pharmacol Res. 2014 Dec;90():36-47. PMID: 25263930
citations.BibTeX: @article{25263930, title={Fenofibrate and dipyridamole treatments in low-doses either alone or in combination blunted the development of nephropathy in diabetic rats.}, author={Balakumar P and Varatharajan R and Nyo YH and Renushia R and Raaginey D and Oh AN and Akhtar SS and Rupeshkumar M and Sundram K and Dhanaraj SA}, journal={Pharmacol Res}, volume={90}, pages={36-47}}
